mapper.insert: insert into process_table( process_idx, process_seq, process_name, process_info, process_time, process_timeunit) values( #{process_idx}, #{process_seq}, #{process_name}, #{process_info}, #{process_time}, #{process_timeunit})
mapper.select: select process_idx, process_seq, process_name, process_info, process_time, process_timeunit from process_table
